title: Dancing at Paul Taylor, a New Generation Finds Its Footing
description: For its Lincoln Center season, the Paul Taylor Dance Company presents premieres by Lauren Lovette and Amy Hall Garner, along with the classics.
dc:creator: Gia Kourlas
media:description: John Harnage in the premiere of “Solitaire” by the company’s resident choreographer, Lauren Lovette. A new era of dancers at Paul Taylor moves with the same gusto and grit as those who came before.
